report.name: suivi_detail

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select:
-- synthese des engagements par poste
SELECT DISTINCT ca.clibrca clibrca, ca.codcamo || ' - ' || LPAD(lig.codinv,3,'0') ligne, lig.libelle libelle_inv, lig.type || ' - ' || inv.lib_type type_inv, LPAD(lr.codinv,3,'0') || ' - ' || LPAD(lr.codrea,2,'0') lib_type, decode(lr.codrea,null,'vide','ok') test, lr.num_cmd num_commande, lr.type_cmd type_commande, lr.type_eng type_eng, lr.marque marque, lr.modele modele, -- lr.matricule matricule, proj.icpi || ' - '|| proj.ilibel lib_proj, ca.codcamo codcamo, (inv.codposte|| ' - ' || p.lib_poste) poste, lig.annee annee, lig.notifie*decode(lig.not_tvarecup, null,(1+t1.tva/100*(1-tr.taux/100)) ,1+lig.not_tvarecup/100) budget, lr.engage*(1+ pack_suivi_investissement.cherche_tva(lr.date_saisie)/100*(1-tr.taux/100)) engage, --sum(lr.engage) engage_proj, sum(lig.re_estime*decode(lig.not_tvarecup, null, (1+t1.tva/100*(1-tr.taux/100)) , (1+ t2.tva/100*(1-tr.taux/100)))) reestime --lig.disponible dispo
FROM centre_activite ca, ligne_investissement lig, investissements inv, ligne_realisation lr, proj_info proj, poste p, taux_recup tr, tva t1, tva t2
WHERE --jointures inv.codposte=p.codposte AND ca.codcamo=lig.codcamo AND inv.codtype = lig.type AND lig.icpi=proj.icpi AND lr.codcamo(+)=lig.codcamo AND lr.codinv(+)=lig.codinv AND lr.annee(+)=lig.annee -- AND tr.filcode = ca.filcode --AND tr.annee = lig.annee &P_T_WHERE AND t1.datetva =(select max(TVA.datetva) from tva where datetva <= pack_suivi_investissement.cherche_date_exercice) AND t2.datetva =(select max(TVA.datetva) from tva where datetva <= to_date(lig.date_modif_re,'DD/MM/YYYY') ) --conditions --AND to_char(lig.annee)=:P_PARAM7 &P_WHERE
GROUP BY inv.codposte, p.lib_poste, ca.codcamo, ca.clibrca , lig.type, lig.codinv , lig.libelle, lr.codrea , lr.codinv , lig.notifie, lr.num_cmd , lr.type_cmd , lr.type_eng , lr.marque , lr.modele , --lr.matricule , inv.lib_type, proj.icpi, proj.ilibel, lig.annee, lr.engage, lr.date_saisie, lig.not_tvarecup, t1.tva, t2.tva, tr.taux

dataDescriptor.expression: sum ( lig.re_estime * decode ( lig.not_tvarecup , null , ( 1 + t1.tva / 100 * ( 1 - tr.taux / 100 ) ) , ( 1 + t2.tva / 100 * ( 1 - tr.taux / 100 ) ) ) )
lig.notifie * decode ( lig.not_tvarecup , null , ( 1 + t1.tva / 100 * ( 1 - tr.taux / 100 ) ) , 1 + lig.not_tvarecup / 100 )

dataSource.name: Q_2
dataSource.select:
-- synthese des engagements par poste
SELECT DISTINCT lig.type || ' - ' || inv.lib_type type_inv, ca.codcamo || ' - ' || LPAD(lig.codinv,3,'0') ligne, lig.libelle libelle_inv1, LPAD(lr.codinv,3,'0') || ' - ' || LPAD(lr.codrea,2,'0') lib_type, decode(lr.codrea,null,'vide','ok') test, lr.num_cmd num_commande, lr.type_cmd type_commande, lr.type_eng type_eng, lr.marque marque, lr.modele modele, --lr.matricule matricule, proj.icpi || ' - '|| proj.ilibel lib_proj, (inv.codposte|| ' - ' || p.lib_poste) poste, lig.annee annee, lig.notifie*decode(lig.not_tvarecup, null,(1+t1.tva/100*(1-tr.taux/100)) ,1+lig.not_tvarecup/100) budget, lr.engage*(1+ pack_suivi_investissement.cherche_tva(lr.date_saisie)/100*(1-tr.taux/100)) engage, -- sum(lr.engage) engage_proj, sum(lig.re_estime*decode(lig.not_tvarecup, null, (1+t1.tva/100*(1-tr.taux/100)) , (1+ t2.tva/100*(1-tr.taux/100)))) reestime -- sum(lig.disponible) dispo
FROM centre_activite ca, ligne_investissement lig, investissements inv, ligne_realisation lr, proj_info proj, poste p, taux_recup tr, tva t1, tva t2
WHERE --jointures inv.codposte=p.codposte AND ca.codcamo=lig.codcamo AND inv.codtype = lig.type AND lig.icpi=proj.icpi AND lr.codcamo(+)=lig.codcamo AND lr.codinv(+)=lig.codinv AND lr.annee(+)=lig.annee -- -- AND tr.filcode = ca.filcode --AND tr.annee = lig.annee &P_T_WHERE AND t1.datetva =(select max(TVA.datetva) from tva where datetva <= pack_suivi_investissement.cherche_date_exercice) AND t2.datetva =(select max(TVA.datetva) from tva where datetva <= to_date(lig.date_modif_re,'DD/MM/YYYY') ) --conditions --AND to_char(lig.annee)=:P_PARAM7 &P_WHERE
GROUP BY inv.codposte, p.lib_poste, lig.type, lig.codinv , lr.codinv , lig.libelle, lr.codrea , ca.codcamo, lig.notifie, lr.num_cmd , lr.type_cmd , lr.type_eng , lr.marque , lr.modele , --lr.matricule , inv.lib_type, proj.icpi, proj.ilibel, lig.annee, lr.engage, lr.date_saisie, lig.not_tvarecup, t1.tva, t2.tva, tr.taux

dataDescriptor.expression: lig.notifie * decode ( lig.not_tvarecup , null , ( 1 + t1.tva / 100 * ( 1 - tr.taux / 100 ) ) , 1 + lig.not_tvarecup / 100 )
sum ( lig.re_estime * decode ( lig.not_tvarecup , null , ( 1 + t1.tva / 100 * ( 1 - tr.taux / 100 ) ) , ( 1 + t2.tva / 100 * ( 1 - tr.taux / 100 ) ) ) )

textSegment.string: SITUATION BUDGETAIRE AVEC DETAIL DES ENGAGEMENTS
